Key Match Events: Rishad Hossain hit an unbeaten 18-ball 48 with 4 sixes and 5 fours
Janith Liyanage scored his maiden ODI century
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzid Hasan came on as a concussion substitute
Rishad Hossain's performance was crucial in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka couldn't muster up a big total
Bangladesh lost three players to injuries during the match
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed took Richard Kettleborough's place
Others: Taskin Ahmed took three wickets to restrict Sri Lanka
Bangladesh won by 4 wickets (with 58 balls remaining)
